content: lovely community of knitters from all over the world and there will be threads to share photos of your knitting progress chat about the knitting and share thoughts on the reflections - the document will also be uploaded on victoria methodist church s website here https //www vic-methodist-bristol org uk/advent-knitalong-2024/ https //www vic-methodist-bristol org uk/advent-knitalong-2024/ - finally users of ravelry can access the document there as well as add project pages and keep track of progress there https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/advent-knitalong-2024 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/advent-knitalong-2024 we hope that you ll join us
